column4: jordan: can you try to run the molecule screensaver and see if it works?
really? it doesn't lock up yourcomputer?
i have a fast computer and a fast video card
pentium 4 2.4ghz with 768mb of ram, 40 gig hd space, d865perl chipset, i810 onboard audio, and a rage 128 all in wonder
cuz it locks up the machine itself
and i don't see how a screensaver of al things would lock up
it might be ancient but it works
just get a slightly newer ati (r100 or r200) or get a very recent nvidia
you'll have to install it manually (apt-get build-dep is your friend)
it install the build dependencies for a particular package
